TimePeriod.description: Time period to which the data corresponds.

AdDistribution.description: Distribution network where the ad has been displayed.

ConversionRate.description: Percentage of conversions compared to total clicks.

LowQualityClicksPercent.description: Percentage of low-quality clicks compared to total clicks.

LowQualityImpressionsPercent.description: Percentage of low-quality impressions compared to total impressions.

DeviceType.description: Type of device where the ad was displayed.

ImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of impressions divided by the total available impressions.

ImpressionLostToBudgetPercent.description: Percentage of impressions lost due to budget constraints.

ImpressionLostToRankAggPercent.description: Percentage of impressions lost due to aggregated rank constraints.

LandingPageExperience.description: Score of the landing page experience.

HistoricalQualityScore.description: Historical quality score of the ad.

HistoricalAdRelevance.description: Historical relevance score of the ad.

PhoneImpressions.description: Total number of impressions on phones.

PhoneCalls.description: Total number of phone calls generated from the ad.

Network.description: Network where the ad was displayed.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: Revenue generated for each unit of currency spent on ads.

CostPerAssist.description: Average cost for each assist in conversions.

RevenuePerAssist.description: Average revenue generated per assist in conversions.

CustomParameters.description: Custom parameters associated with the ad.

LowQualityGeneralClicks.description: Total number of low-quality general clicks.

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: Total number of low-quality sophisticated clicks.

ExactMatchImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of exact match impressions divided by the total available exact match impressions.

ClickSharePercent.description: Percentage of available clicks compared to total clicks.

AbsoluteTopImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions divided by the total available absolute top impressions.

FinalUrlSuffix.description: Suffix added to the final URL of the ad.

TopImpressionShareLostToRankPercent.description: The percentage of top impressions lost due to rank constraints.

TopImpressionShareLostToBudgetPercent.description: The percentage of top impressions lost due to budget constraints.

AbsoluteTopImpressionShareLostToRankPerc.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions lost due to rank constraints.

AbsoluteTopImpressionShareLostToBudgetPe.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions lost due to budget constraints.

TopImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions divided by the total available top impressions.

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of absolute top impressions divided by the total available absolute top impressions.

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of top impressions divided by the total available top impressions.

AllConversionRate.description: Percentage of conversions compared to all clicks.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: Revenue earned for each unit of currency spent on ads.

ViewThroughConversions.description: Conversions that occur after a view-through impression.

AudienceImpressionSharePercent.description: The percentage of audience impressions divided by the total available audience impressions.

AudienceImpressionLostToRankPercent.description: Percentage of audience impressions lost due to rank constraints.

AudienceImpressionLostToBudgetPercent.description: Percentage of audience impressions lost due to budget limitations.

LowQualityConversionsQualified.description: Qualified total number of low-quality conversions.

ViewThroughRate.description: Rate of view-through impressions compared to total impressions.

VideoViewsAt25Percent.description: Total number of video views at 25% completion.

VideoViewsAt50Percent.description: Total number of video views at 50% completion.

VideoViewsAt75Percent.description: Total number of video views at 75% completion.

CompletedVideoViews.description: Total number of video views that were completed.

VideoCompletionRate.description: Rate at which viewers complete watching the video.

AverageWatchTimePerVideoView.description: Average watch time per video view.
